isis.stitle: Electrical System Troubleshooting Guide - 3300 Model - LIGHT SYSTEMS - CLEARANCE LIGHTS - DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: DIAGNOSTICS
svcproc.para: If any of the other park lights are working (only the roof marker lights are inoperative) there will be no diagnostic trouble codes logged.
A short or open in the clearance light circuits will be apparent when the park or headlights are turned on and the clearance lights do not come on.

An electronic service tool, running the "Diamond Logic Builder™" diagnostic software, can be used to check operation of the park lights and monitor activation of the park light switch. See the diagnostic software manual for details on using the software.
